generalInfo.briefDescription: Uma, a village girl chasing her dream of becoming a doctor, meets Dev, a heartbroken aspiring rock star turned alcoholic. After a life-threatening injury lands him in her hospital, fate brings them together again, uncovering a shocking truth.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Nandu, a skilled lock picker with a taste for petty crime, teams up with Meena, a quirky thief with charm to match. Their fun-filled heists take a daring turn when they target an ancient, untouched locker hidden in the palace of Raja Chandra Varma.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Living in different countries, Lovely & Jean are thrown into turmoil when a visit to London with their young daughter sparks a legal crisis. Unfamiliar with parenting laws in a foreign land, they must fight not just the system, but for their family.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Journalist Vikram reopens a 15-year-old case in Mangaluru to honour his late father. As he digs deeper, he uncovers a chilling connection to a recent string of murders in Bengaluru, investigated by Ajaz. Can they solve the mystery & deliver justice?

generalInfo.briefDescription: When a sumo wrestler from Japan unexpectedly washes ashore in Chennai, he forms an unlikely friendship with Shiva, a local surfer. Together, they embark on an adventure to get him back to Japan for his championship title & to rediscover his past.
